  • Method Details

    • setBit

      public static final void setBit(byte[] bytes, int byteIndex, int bitIndex, boolean isSet)
      Sets or clears the the bit at bitIndex in the byte at byteIndex.
      Parameters:
      bytes - Array containing the byte to set/clear
      byteIndex - Index of the byte to set/clear
      bitIndex - Index of the bit to set/clear
      isSet - True to set the bit. False to clear the bit.

    • setBit

      public static final byte setBit(byte b, int bit, boolean isSet)
      Set a specified bit in b.
      Parameters:
      b - The byte to set bit in
      bit - The index of the bit to set in b.
      isSet - Controls if bit should be set or cleared.

    • isSet

      public static final boolean isSet(byte b, int whichBit)
      Indicates if whichBit was set in b.
      Parameters:
      b - The byte to check if whichBit is set.
      whichBit - The bit to check if it's set.
      Returns:
      True if whichBit is set in b.
